message:
vai,ai matro amar driver er shathe kotha bollam,,amr driver HUMAYUN,tar chachato vai er dokan chlw rana vobon er niche...gotokal 3tola & 4tolay bikot shobdo die fatol dhore.,..tatkhonic DC eshe oi building a kawke dhukte mana kore...& ashe pasher shobaike malpotro nie shore jete bole...amr driver tar chachato vai er dokan er shob malamal nie rater 1tar shomoy savar theke chole ashe,..

Fan Post
